ComicInfo.Title: The Old Man on the Ocean Floor
ComicInfo.Summary:
An old man emerges from the Barsoom hinterlands, mad in the head and dressed in tatters. Could he be the key to bringing down the fascist regime in New Helium?
*List of covers and their creators:* Cover | Name | Creator(s) | Sidebar Location | --------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- A | Cover A | Garry Brown | 1 | B | Cover B | Juan Doe | 2 | C/RI | 1:10 Retailer Incentive "Black & White" Edition Cover | Garry Brown | 3 | D/RI | 1:20 Retailer Incentive "Virgin" Edition Cover | Juan Doe | 4 |
